products.title: Sevilla Tranquility Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription:
Sometimes only black will do and this sevilla tranquility black roller blind will do the job perfectly. Its as dark as the darkest abyss and shades perfectly too.  
This blind will look superb in monochrome schemes, which are timeless in their popularity. Black and white scheme
